page.title: 09The church in Hailey.
page.content: The church in Hailey is set back behind trees and woodland.The church was built by Willam Wilkinson about 100 years ago and was built to look like an old church.George Crabbrolfe was the vicar at that time so he blessed the new church in 1868. It was a coincidence that Willam Wilkinson was George Crabbrolfe's son-in -law.The church is beautiful in side and it has got a few stained glass windows which are very colourful.The highest bit of the church is the alter. The church has got a steep roof with a small tower. The roof has recently been repaired. It all cost 27,000 pounds.Outside there is a grave yard which is still being used.
